short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension renders a new button in github PR editor that allows pre-existing attachments to be placed inside a markdown grid ofâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension renders a new button in github PR editor that allows pre-existing attachments to be placed inside a markdown grid of the user's choice, and also to generate an empty markdown table directly from the PR editor
